se.project.business_logic.controllers.activities_assignment

Class ActivityForwardingController

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.project.business_logic.controllers.AbstractController
      • se.project.business_logic.controllers.activities_assignment.ActivityForwardingController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller

    public class ActivityForwardingController
extends AbstractController
    Manages the business logic behind an ActivityForwardingView.

    • Method Detail

      • setAvailabilityModels

        public void setAvailabilityModels(PlannedActivity plannedActivity,
                                  WeeklyAvailability weeklyAvailability,
                                  java.lang.String dayOfWeek,
                                  int dayOfMonth,
                                  java.lang.String maintainerPercentage)
        Sets all the informations of models to display and on which work.
        Parameters:
        plannedActivity - is the activity that has to be assigned.
        weeklyAvailability - is the weekly availability of a maintainer.
        dayOfWeek - is the day in the week in which the activity has to be assigned.
        dayOfMonth - is the day in the month in which the activity has to be assigned.
        maintainerPercentage - is the percentage of availability of the maintainer in the day in which the activity has to be assigned.

        public void viewTimeAvailability(PlannedActivity plannedActivity,
                                 WeeklyAvailability weeklyAvailability)
        Updates the table in the page inserting the time availability of the maintainer.

        weeklyAvailability - is the weekly availability of the maintainer.

      • forwardActivity

        public boolean forwardActivity(PlannedActivity plannedActivity,
                               WeeklyAvailability weeklyAvailability)
        Assigns and forwards the maintenance activity to the maintainer in the selected day and turn.
        Parameters:
        plannedActivity - is the planned activity to assign.
        weeklyAvailability - is the weekly availability of the maintainer.
        Returns:
        true if the maintainer is available in the specified turn, false otherwise.

      • colorTable

        public void colorTable(javax.swing.JTable table,
                       int column)
        Change the color of the cell in the table according to their values.
        Parameters:
        table - is the table in the page.
        column - is a specific column of the table.
